headline: Adobe And Cognizant Expand AI Partnership To Deepen Enterprise Content Role
summary: Adobe and Cognizant announced an expanded global partnership to integrate generative AI into enterprise content, governance, and customer experience workflows. The collaboration focuses on using Adobe's AI-powered platforms with Cognizant's implementation capabilities to scale AI driven content operations for large organizations. The partners are launching a joint go to market approach aimed at helping enterprises manage content demand, brand consistency, and cost pressures. Adobe, traded...

headline: DAMAC Group works with Cognizant as strategic partner to transform IT operations and elevate customer experience
summary: Cognizant (NASDAQ: CTSH) is collaborating under a three-year strategic agreement with DAMAC Group, a private global conglomerate encompassing a diverse portfolio across various industries, including property development and real estate, data centres, retail and fashion, hospitality, capital markets, and logistics.

headline: Palantir And Cognizant Target Regulated AI Growth In Healthcare And Enterprise
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) announced a partnership with Cognizant to accelerate AI driven modernization in healthcare and enterprise operations. The collaboration focuses on deploying Palantir Foundry and its Artificial Intelligence Platform (AIP) across regulated and complex environments. The agreement aims to create repeatable models for enterprise grade AI solutions across Cognizant's client base. For Palantir, known for its data platforms in government and defense, this deal...
